Features

BigMints is an experience-first digital company that leverages technology to improve customer relationships. Our team comprises industry experts with several years of experience in Digital Business Transformation, Software engineering, and Customer Experience.

Our core values

Customer Centricity

Customer success is at the heart of everything we do. Bapp puts the needs and satisfaction of its customers at the forefront of all decision-making and actions.

Collaboration

Bapp values teamwork and collaboration with its partners, customers, and employees, recognizing that success is best achieved through working together.

Transparency and Trust

Bapp is committed to being transparent in its dealings with customers and partners and building long-lasting relationships based on mutual trust and respect.

Reliability

Bapp is dedicated to providing a seamless and trustworthy booking management experience, consistently delivering on its promises and guarantees.
